title: [1.6.4-1.7.10][SSP/SMP][InfStudio]Doge Mod丨神烦狗

2014-8-7 21:34 上传





WOW
这个mod在游戏中加入了Doge以及Doge coin这个基础材料
新版本已更改Doge名为Shibe

Doge的一些特性：
Shibe：狗的十倍血量
各种Doge工具：相当于2倍强度，一半耐久的钻石工具
各种Doge护甲：同上
Doge coin：拥有着把任何生物变为Doge的能力
Doge Launcher：将Doge coin发射出去造成6点伤害
GPU：往里放入Mining Rig来获得Doge coin

----- 娱乐视频[翻墙]-----

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZxJl9iq2uMg

----- Changelog -----

0.5.1 - Made doge armour and tools repairable with coins in anvil
Made automation possible by setting up input and output sides of the mining rig
Changed the name of the doge mob to Shibe
0.5.0 - Added the GPU and Mining Rig which can be used as an alternative way to get Dogecoins.

0.4.3 - Loads of intenal changes, some small fixes and tweaks to damage. The doge launcher is now enchantable and some doge tool stat settings in config file.
0.4.2 - Fixed tail rotation in 1.7.2
0.4.1 - Fixed crash when running a server

你用的是显血mod吧- -会显示错误的，之前还把正常驯服的Doge显示500血
怎么给神烦狗加血？用了好多肉都不能加血，只能生育小神烦狗。
